title: How can we add a song to Gaana.com? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is Certainly not any way if you are a consumer But Of you are an Artist you can add your own songs by contacting Gaana™ By Email. As Gaana doesn't not have the ability to add your own songs and library to the cloud, May be future updates and changes have a scope of adding this feature as well but currently there isn't any way that can be done
